title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
created_time: August 24, 2022, 01:38:32 AMLast edit: September 01, 2022, 06:21:10 AM by yahoo62278
content: Punt.com is looking to advertise their casino and would like to hire 10 users from member to legendary rank to help them out. Announcement Here is there announcement thread. Take a look at the site and if this is a project you would like to help out advertising for, then drop your application in here.How to ApplyCode:Bitcointalk Username:Profile linkPost Count: ..... (including this one)btc addyForum RankPaymentsMember .0009Full member .0018Sr .0027Hero/Legendary .0036A week runs from Wednesday to Tuesday and is based on the UTC timezone. Posts after 23:59 UTC Tuesday will count for the next week.Payment will be credited every Wednesday.Spreadsheethttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BToBxw4l1XmLEvhSOvw5b9xUdqYufyyUwLSPqwBSS6M/edit?usp=sharingRulesMust wear Signature and avatar Must make 25 quality posts per week to be paid10 posts per week must be in gambling sectionsUsers must make at least 20 qualifying posts to qualify for half payment( 5 in gambling sections)Punt is looking for active users who use the forum on a daily or every other day basis. Users cannot post a majority of their posts in a single day trying to qualify, you will end up being removed from the campaign and paid nothing if that's you.If you do not usually post in the gambling section, do not apply for this campaign. Posts must be constructive and on topic150 characters minimum. Links and quoting of other posts do not count towards character count.Users  may use their affiliate code in the signatureYou may only advertise for Punt in your sig if accepted in the campaignUsers not posting enough to qualify for weekly pay can be removed with no warning1 bitcointalk account per person(If you are found to be enrolling alts you and your alt are kicked out with no pay)If you receive neg trust while enrolled, the offense will be looked at and could disqualify you from being paid.You may not advertise any other sites in your signaturesPosts in any sig campaign or bounty threads will not count Users will not rank up unless I announce there is an available openingPosts in Games & Rounds, Off topic, Lending, Auctions, Politics & Society, Beginners and help, Tokens, or Archival will not count SIGNATUREMemberCode:[center]████[url=https://punt.com/]██[/url] ████[url=https://punt.com/]██[/url] ████[url=https://punt.com/]██           |     P U N T . c o m     |
